profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Tim McCabe using the OhioLINK EAD Application in 2013

did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Xavier University Divisional Annual Reports collection
did.abstract: A collection of annual reports submitted to the university president by divisional heads at Xavier University. These documents were used for planning purposes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: A collection of the divisional annual reports submitted to the Xavier University president by vice presidents. Not every Xavier division is represented in the annual report collection for a given year.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: This material is arranged chronologically by academic year. Within each academic year various reports are arranged generally alphabetically by division.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Please contact the Xavier University Archives staff.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box #, Folder #, XUA-8, Xavier University Divisional Annual Reports collection, Special Collections and Archives, Xavier University Library, Cincinnati, Ohio.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred to the Xavier University Archives from the President's Office on 6/13/2013.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.

controlaccess.head: Organizations/Corporations:
controlaccess.corpname: Xavier University (Cincinnati, Ohio). Office of the Provost and Chief Academic Officer
Xavier University (Cincinnati, Ohio). Vice President for Spiritual Development.
Xavier University (Cincinnati, Ohio). Vice President for Student Development.
Xavier University (Cincinnati, Ohio). Vice President for University Relations.

dsc.head: Detailed Description of The Collection
dsc.p: This collection encompasses the annual divisional reports submitted by Xavier vice presidents to the university president. The divisions are the following: Academic Affairs, the Administrative Vice President's Office, Financial Administration, Spiritual Development, Student Development, and University Relations. For a given academic year there may be found the reports of offices/programs as part of the larger divisional report. [Note: The reports for the 1988/1989 Academic Year are absent from this collection.]
